gov.nasa.jpf.autodoc.parser

Class ClassFileParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • ClassFileReaderAdapter
      • gov.nasa.jpf.autodoc.parser.ClassFileParser

  • public class ClassFileParser
extends ClassFileReaderAdapter
    Class to extract ClassInfo from Java classfiles.
    Author:
    Carlos Uribe

        public void parse(java.lang.String path)
           throws ClassFileException
        Parse a classfile given the location (path) of the file.
        Parameters:
        path - Filepath where the parser can find the .class file.
        project - Owner project of the class.
        Throws:
        ClassFileException

           throws ClassFileException
        Parse a classfile from a classname and a set of pathnames.
        Parameters:
        classname - Named package classname.
        pathnames - String array containing pathnames of classpath.

        ClassFileException

      • setClass

        public void setClass(ClassFile cf,
            java.lang.String clsName,
            java.lang.String superClsName,
            int flags,
            int cpCount)
        Collect classfile's classname, superclassname and flags.

        NOTE - This method is automatically called by ClassFile when parse(ClassFileReaderAdapter) method is called.

      • setInterface

        public void setInterface(ClassFile cf,
                int ifcIndex,
                java.lang.String ifcName)
        Collect interfaces implemented by classfile.

        NOTE - This method is automatically called by ClassFile when parse(ClassFileReaderAdapter) method is called.
